channel.title: HELLO! I AM KAMALDEEN AIYELESO on K. Aiyeleso
channel.description: Recent content in HELLO! I AM KAMALDEEN AIYELESO on K. Aiyeleso

item.title: Project 4: Customer Attrition
item.description: Built a model that predicts whether a customer will stop their subscription or not Data was sourced from kaggle dataset. Performed data cleaning and data transformation to enable the data to be ready for excellent analysis Models employed: Random Forest, SVM, Linear Model and Decision Tree. Random Forest performed best with an accuracy result of 95%. Though not extremely good in the medical field but can be improved on. Skills employed include Python, Matplotlib, Sklearn, Logistics Regression, Random Forest Classifier, Support Vector Classifier, Decision Trees Classifier.

item.title: Project 3: Breast Cancer Prediction
item.description: A data science tool that predicts the type of tumor present in a woman’s breast considering the features of the tumor Data sourced from kaggle dataset. Performed data cleaning and data transformation Models used include: Random Forest, SVM, Linear Model and Decision Tree. Random Forest performed best with an accuracy result of 97%. Though not extremely good in the medical field but can be improved on. Skills employed include Python, Matplotlib, Sklearn, Logistics Regression, Random Forest Classifier, Support Vector Classifier, Decision Trees Classifier.

item.title: Project 2: Time Series Forecast Using ARIMA
item.description: Data was sourced from Kaggle and contained over 900,000 instances Explored the dataset and discovered data were grouped by store type and item type Gave insights on items that are selling bad and contributing less to the sales return Gave insights on the seasonality of the trend which helps business owner make informed decision Built a reusable function that can be tested on the store type, item type and range of year required for analysis Models used include ARIMA Skills used are Python, Matplotlib, Sklearn, Numpy and Seaborn.

item.title: Project 1: House Prices Predictor
item.description: A tool that gets the price of a house rent based on the selected location, type of building, room numbers, parking lots available, baths and toilets available Scraped over 1000 instances of house prices accross different locations in Lagos state using Python and BeautifulSoup Wrangled and cleaned the data using pyhton manipulation skills Models used include Random Forest, SVM, XGBoost and Linear Regression. Skills employed include Numpy, Seaborn, Python, Random Forest, Sklearn, Xgboost and BeautifulSoup.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you would like to tell me anything, please feel free to send me a mail below. I reply fast. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
